a:5:{s:1:"d";O:8:"stdClass":47:{s:9:"short_des";N;s:10:"article_id";s:4:"7290";s:12:"article_type";s:12:"publications";s:3:"uri";s:37:"redefining-indonesias-digital-economy";s:8:"pub_type";s:1:"3";s:5:"title";s:45:"Redefining Indonesiaâ€™s Digital Economy";s:11:"posted_date";s:10:"2023-01-10";s:11:"posted_year";s:4:"2023";s:12:"posted_month";s:1:"1";s:7:"content";s:1049:"<p style="text-align: justify;">The Indonesian digital economy is the largest and most attractive investment destination amongst the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Member States (AMS). The sector has grown more than fourfold in the last 4 years and has supported other sectors. Amid the exponential growth, digital businesses are facing what is called a &lsquo;tech winter&rsquo; in which start-ups are likely to experience slowdowns or even bankruptcy. In addition, although the digital transformation helps businesses improve productivity and drive economic growth, it has consequences for employment and wages, particularly for less skilled workers. While the potential of the digital economy must be continuously harnessed, some key initiatives need to be implemented to mitigate its negative effects.</p><p class="pdf"><a title="PB-2022-06" href="/uploads/media/policy-brief/FY2022/Redefining-Indonesia%E2%80%99s-Digital-Economy.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Redefining Indonesia&rsquo;s Digital Economy</a></p>";s:10:"image_name";s:86:"/uploads/publications/20230110/redefining-indonesias-digital-economy-website-cover.jpg";s:9:"video_url";s:0:"";s:4:"tags";s:44:"Digital Economy,digital innovation,Indonesia";s:6:"editor";s:0:"";s:6:"author";s:45:"Militcyano Samuel Sapulette,Pyan Amin Muchtar";s:6:"doc_no";s:0:"";s:6:"period";s:4:"2023";s:14:"article_status";s:1:"0";s:10:"event_time";s:0:"";s:5:"venue";s:9:"Indonesia";s:5:"major";s:0:"";s:16:"article_keywords";s:0:"";s:9:"organizer";s:0:"";s:12:"image_name_2";s:0:"";s:10:"start_date";s:10:"2023-01-10";s:8:"end_date";s:10:"0000-00-00";s:8:"keywords";s:2157:"Redefining Indonesiaâ€™s Digital Economy Redefining Indonesiaâ€™s Digital Economy The Indonesian digital economy is the largest and most attractive investment destination amongst the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Member States (AMS). The sector has grown more than fourfold in the last 4 years and has supported other sectors. Amid the exponential growth, digital businesses are facing what is called a &lsquo;tech winter&rsquo; in which start-ups are likely to experience slowdowns or even bankruptcy. In addition, although the digital transformation helps businesses improve productivity and drive economic growth, it has consequences for employment and wages, particularly for less skilled workers. While the potential of the digital economy must be continuously harnessed, some key initiatives need to be implemented to mitigate its negative effects.
Redefining Indonesia&rsquo;s Digital Economy Digital Economy,digital innovation,Indonesia  Militcyano Samuel Sapulette,Pyan Amin Muchtar  2023  Indonesia    2023-01-10  2023-01-10 10 January 2023 3202 yraunaJ 01 01-10-3202  01-10-3202    aisenodnI  3202  rathcuM nimA nayP,ettelupaS leumaS onayctiliM  aisenodnI,noitavonni latigid,ymonocE latigiD ymonocE latigiD s;ouqsr&aisenodnI gninifedeR
.stceffe evitagen sti etagitim ot detnemelpmi eb ot deen sevitaitini yek emos ,dessenrah ylsuounitnoc eb tsum ymonoce latigid eht fo laitnetop eht elihW .srekrow delliks ssel rof ylralucitrap ,segaw dna tnemyolpme rof secneuqesnoc sah ti ,htworg cimonoce evird dna ytivitcudorp evorpmi sessenisub spleh noitamrofsnart latigid eht hguohtla ,noitidda nI .yctpurknab neve ro snwodwols ecneirepxe ot ylekil era spu-trats hcihw ni ;ouqsr&retniw hcet;ouqsl& a dellac si tahw gnicaf era sessenisub latigid ,htworg laitnenopxe eht dimA .srotces rehto detroppus sah dna sraey 4 tsal eht ni dlofruof naht erom nworg sah rotces ehT .)SMA( setatS rebmeM )NAESA( snoitaN naisA tsaehtuoS fo noitaicossA eht tsgnoma noitanitsed tnemtsevni evitcartta tsom dna tsegral eht si ymonoce latigid naisenodnI ehT ymonocE latigiD s™€âaisenodnI gninifedeR ymonocE latigiD s™€âaisenodnI gninifedeR";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:9:"highlight";s:1:"0";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"100";s:12:"created_date";s:19:"2023-01-09 16:02:48";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2023-01-10 15:25:47";s:11:"modified_by";s:2:"20";s:7:"old_url";N;s:10:"majorEmail";N;s:9:"education";N;s:10:"experience";N;s:12:"publications";N;s:6:"others";N;s:13:"presentations";N;s:7:"feature";N;s:11:"sub_experts";s:1:"1";s:15:"sub_dep_experts";N;s:13:"meta_keywords";N;s:16:"meta_description";N;s:5:"sc_id";s:1:"0";s:15:"thumbnail_image";N;}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-03-07 05:48:40.063094";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
